The SketchUp C API is property of Trimble(r), and we are not sure
if we are allowed to redistribute it. Until further notice,
you should register as a SketchUp developer, download it
yourself, and put it where global libraries belong in your OS.

In macOS: /Libraries/Frameworks/SketchUpAPI.framework
In Windows: 

Please put the macOS version of the SketchUp C API in this folder
